00009 void clAdd( struct Server* server, struct sockaddr_in addr_, int fd_ )
00010 {
00011 
00012         fprintf( stdout, "New client (%d) - Total: %d - Thread: %d\n", fd_, server->con.size + 1, server->id );
00013 
00014         clAdjustSize( server );
00015 
00016         server->con.clients[server->con.size].addr = addr_;
00017         server->con.clients[server->con.size].completeRequest = 0;
00018 
00019         server->fds[server->size].fd = fd_;
00020         server->fds[server->size].events = POLLIN;
00021 
00022         reqInit( &server->con.clients[server->con.size] );
00023         resInit( &server->con.clients[server->con.size] );
00024 
00025 //      bufReset( &server->con.clients[server->con.size].buffer );
00026 //      bufDel( &server->con.clients[server->con.size].buffer );
00027         bufInit( &server->con.clients[server->con.size].buffer );
00028 
00029         server->con.clients[server->con.size].clientID = server->con.size;
00030         server->con.clients[server->con.size].server = server;
00031         server->con.clients[server->con.size].fd = &server->fds[server->size];
00032         server->con.clients[server->con.size].fdID = server->size;
00033 
00034         server->con.size++;
00035         server->size++;
00036 }

00039 void clDelete( struct Server* server, struct Client* client )
00040 {
00041         if ( !server->con.size )
00042                 return;
00043         
00044         fprintf( stdout, "Remove client (%d) - Total: %d - Thread: %d\n", client->fd->fd, server->con.size, server->id );
00045 
00046         int id = client->clientID;
00047         int fdID = client->fd->fd;
00048         close( fdID );
00049 
00050         /* Delete/Reset extern */
00051 //      bufReset( &client->buffer );
00052         bufDel ( &client->buffer );
00053 
00054         resDel( client );
00055         reqDel( client );
00056         cprDel( &client->cprBuffer );
00057 
00058         int oldFdID = client->fdID;
00059 
00060         if ( client->clientID != server->con.size - 1 ) {
00061                 memcpy( client, &server->con.clients[server->con.size - 1], sizeof( struct Client ) );
00062                 memcpy( &client->buffer, &server->con.clients[server->con.size - 1].buffer, sizeof( struct Buffer ) );
00063 
00064                 client->buffer.data = server->con.clients[server->con.size - 1].buffer.data;
00065                 client->clientID = id;
00066         }
00067 
00068 
00069         if ( oldFdID != server->size - 1 ) {
00070                 memcpy( &server->fds[oldFdID], &server->fds[server->size-1], sizeof( struct pollfd ) );
00071 
00072                 for ( int i = 0; i < server->con.size; ++i ) {
00073                         if ( server->con.clients[i].fdID == server->size - 1 ) {
00074                                 server->con.clients[i].fdID = oldFdID;
00075                                 server->con.clients[i].fd = &server->fds[oldFdID];
00076                         }
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 
00080         clPop( server );
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 void clPop( struct Server* server )
00085 {
00086         memset( &server->fds[server->size-1], 0, sizeof( struct pollfd ) );
00087 //      memset( con., 0, sizeof( struct Client ) );
00088         
00089         server->con.size--;
00090         server->size--;
00091 }
00092

00094 int clAdjustSize( struct Server* server )
00095 {
00096         struct Connections* con = &server->con;
00097         int changed = 0, oldrSize = server->con.rSize;
00098 
00099         /* Grow size */
00100         if ( con->size >= con->rSize ) {
00101                 server->rSize = con->rSize *= 2;
00102                 changed = 1;
00103         } else if ( con->size < con->rSize / 4 && con->rSize > 8 ) {
00104 //              con.rSize /= 2;
00105 //              changed = 2;
00106         }
00107 
00108         if ( changed ) {
00109 
00110                 if ( changed == 2 ) {
00111                         for ( int i = con->rSize + 1; i < oldrSize; ++i ) {
00112                                 bufDel( &con->clients[i].buffer );
00113                         }
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 con->clients = realloc( con->clients, ( con->rSize + 1 ) * sizeof( struct Client ) );
00117                 server->fds = realloc( server->fds, ( ( con->rSize - oldrSize ) ) * sizeof( struct pollfd ) );
00118 
00119                 memset( con->clients + con->size, 0, ( con->rSize - con->size ) * sizeof( struct Client ) );
00120 //              server->rSize += ( con->rSize - oldrSize );
00121                 memset( server->fds + server->size, 0, ( server->rSize - server->size ) * sizeof( struct pollfd ) );
00122 
00123                 if ( changed == 1 ) {
00124                         for ( int i = oldrSize; i <= con->rSize; ++i ) {
00125                                 bufInit( &con->clients[i].buffer );
00126                         }
00127                 }
00128 
00129                 return 1;
00130         }
00131 
00132         return 0;
00133 }
